Description: To verify that channel user is able to initiate the "Daily Status Report" request through USSD with all the mandatory fields.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "Daily Status Report" request through USSD if all the mandatory fields are left blank.
To verify that following "PIN" tag name is available while initiating "Daily Status Report" request through USSD and user is able to iniate successfully without entering value in it.
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the request if all the fields having more than the maximum limit of characters
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "Daily Status Report" request if the entered value in the PIN field is having invalid value
To verify that response is initiated successfully with all the mandatory fields(TYPE,TXNSTATUS)and valid values
To verify that TXNSTATUS field contain 200 value if "Daily Status Report" response is generated successfully else it display value other than 200
To verify that success "Daily Status Report" response field contain all the  fields values in the character limit
To verify that channel user is unable to initiate the "Daily Status Report" request if MSISDN1 field contain value of the deleted user.
